strings.SS2_KNIGHT_DESCRIPTION:
The Knight is a skilled expert in melee combat, dueling and parrying foes with precise timing and execution.

<color=#CCD3E0>< ! > parry.
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so he left, battered to the core of hope.
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_OUTRO_FAILURE: ..and so he vanished, shield shattered and hope snuffed out.
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_BODY_LORE: why are there knights in space
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_PASSIVE_DESC: Carry up to three stacks of Fortified, <style=cIsUtility>increasing armor by 100</style> as long as at least one stack is held. Lose a stack when <style=cIsHealth>damaged</style>. Regain 2 stacks after a <style=cIsUtility>succcesful parry</style>.
strings.SS2_KEYWORD_PARRY: <style=cKeywordName>Parrying</style><style=cSub>Getting struck just after activating blocks the damage, adds two stacks of Fortified, and performs a stunning parry for 950% damage. Empowers next use of Clash's beam to deal +50% more damage and stun.'</style>
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_SECONDARY_SHIELD_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>Parrying</style>. Hold to <style=cIsUtility>increase armor by 100</style>. Replace your next primary with <style=cIsDamage>Clash</style>, a <style=cIsUtility>Stunning</style> <style=cIsDamage>240% damage</style> shield bash accompanied by a <style=cIsDamage>480% damage</style> beam.
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_SHIELD_BASH_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>Stunning</style>. Swing in front for <style=cIsDamage>240% damage</style>, and fire a piercing beam for <style=cIsDamage>480% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_UTILITY_LEAP_DESC: Leap forward and slice in front repeatedly, dealing <style=cIsDamage>240% damage</style> with each slice. The number of slices increases with attack speed.
strings.SS2_KNIGHT_SPECIAL_SPIN_DESC: Buff yourself and nearby allies, gaining <style=cIsUtility>40% movement speed</style> and <style=cIsDamage>attack speed</style>, then perform a spin attack for <style=cIsDamage>800% damage</style>.
